name: NULL trait!
description: This is a bug.  Weird. (pldata.cpp:traits)

name: Fleet-Footed
description: You can run more quickly than most, resulting in a 15%% speed bonus on sure footing.

name: Parkour Expert
description: You're skilled at clearing obstacles; terrain like railings or counters are as easy for you to move on as solid ground.

name: Quick
description: You're just generally quick!  You get a 10%% bonus to action points.

name: Optimist
description: Nothing gets you down!  You savor the joys of life, ignore its hardships, and are generally happier than most people.

name: Fast Healer
description: You heal a little faster than most; sleeping will heal more lost HP.

name: Light Eater
description: Your metabolism is a little slower, and you require less food than most.

name: Pain Resistant
description: You have a high tolerance for pain.

name: Night Vision
description: You possess natural night vision, and can see two squares instead of one in pitch blackness.

name: Poison Resistant
description: Your system is rather tolerant of poisons and toxins, and most will affect you less.

name: Fast Reader
description: You're a quick reader, and can get through books a lot faster than most.

name: Tough
description: It takes a lot to bring you down!  You get a 20%% bonus to all hit points.

name: Thick-Skinned
description: Your skin is tough.  Cutting damage is slightly reduced for you.

name: Packmule
description: You can manage to find space for anything!  You can carry 40%% more volume.

name: Fast Learner
description: You have a flexible mind, allowing you to learn skills much faster than others.  Note that this only applies to real-world experience, not to skill gain from other sources like books.

name: Deft
description: While you're not any better at melee combat, you are better at recovering from a miss, and will be able to attempt another strike faster.

name: Drunken Master
description: The ancient arts of drunken brawling come naturally to you!  While under the influence of alcohol, your melee skill will rise considerably, especially unarmed combat.

name: Gourmand
description: You eat faster, and can eat and drink more, than anyone else!  You also enjoy food more; delicious food is better for your morale, and you don't mind some unsavory meals.

name: Animal Empathy
description: Peaceful animals will not run away from you, and even aggressive animals are less likely to attack.  This only applies to natural animals such as woodland creatures.

name: Terrifying
description: There's something about you that creatures find frightening, and they are more likely to try to flee.

name: Disease Resistant
description: It's very unlikely that you will catch ambient diseases like a cold or the flu.

name: High Adrenaline
description: If you are in a very dangerous situation, you may experience a temporary rush which increases your speed and strength significantly.

name: Self-aware
description: You get to see your exact amount of HP remaining, instead of only having a vague idea of whether you're in good condition or not.

name: Inconspicuous
description: While sleeping or staying still, it is less likely that monsters will wander close to you.

name: Masochist
description: Although you still suffer the negative effects of pain, it also brings a unique pleasure to you.

name: Cross-Dresser
description: Covering your body in clothing typical for the opposite gender makes you feel better.

name: Light Step
description: You make less noise while walking.  You're also less likely to set off traps.

name: Android
description: At some point in the past you had a bionic upgrade installed in your body.  You start the game with a power system, and one random bionic enhancement.

name: Robust Genetics
description: You have a very strong genetic base.  If you mutate, the odds that the mutation will be beneficial are greatly increased.

name: Cannibal
description: For your whole life you've been forbidden from indulging in your peculiar tastes.  Now the world's ended, and you'll be damned if anyone is going to tell you you can't eat people.

name: Martial Arts Training
description: You have received some martial arts training at a local dojo.  You start with your choice of karate, judo, aikido, tai chi, or taekwondo.

name: Self-Defense Classes
description: You have taken some self-defense classes at a nearby gym.  You start with your choice of Capoeira, Krav Maga, Muay Thai, Ninjutsu, or Zui Quan.

name: Shaolin Adept
description: You have studied the arts of the Shaolin monks.  You start with one of the five animal fighting styles: Tiger, Crane, Leopard, Snake, or Dragon.

name: Venom Mob Protege
description: You are a pupil of the Venom Clan.  You start with one of the five deadly venoms: Centipede, Viper, Scorpion, Lizard, or Toad.

name: Skilled Liar
description: You have no qualms about bending the truth, and have practically no tells.  Telling lies and otherwise bluffing will be much easier for you.

starting_trait.name: Pretty
starting_trait.description: You are a sight to behold.  NPCs who care about such thing will react more kindly to you.

starting_trait.name: Near-Sighted
starting_trait.description: Without your glasses, your seeing radius is severely reduced!  However, while wearing glasses this trait has no effect, and you are guaranteed to start with a pair.

starting_trait.name: Far-Sighted
starting_trait.description: Without reading glasses, you are unable to read anything, and take penalities on melee accuracy and electronics/tailoring crafting.  However, you are guaranteed to start with a pair of reading glasses.

starting_trait.name: Heavy Sleeper
starting_trait.description: You're quite the heavy sleeper.  Noises are unlikely to wake you up.

starting_trait.name: Asthmatic
starting_trait.description: You will occasionally need to use an inhaler, or else suffer severe physical limitations.  However, you are guaranteed to start with an inhaler.

starting_trait.name: Bad Back
starting_trait.description: You simply can not carry as much as people with a similar strength could. Your maximum weight carried is reduced by 35%%.

starting_trait.name: Illiterate
starting_trait.description: You never learned to read!  Books and computers are off-limits to you.

starting_trait.name: Poor Hearing
starting_trait.description: Your hearing is poor, and you may not hear quiet or far-off noises.

starting_trait.name: Insomniac
starting_trait.description: You have a hard time falling asleep, even under the best circumstances!

starting_trait.name: Meat Intolerance
starting_trait.description: You have problems with eating meat.  It's possible for you to eat it, but you will suffer morale penalties due to nausea.

starting_trait.name: Glass Jaw
starting_trait.description: Your head can't take much abuse.  Its maximum HP is 20%% lower than usual.

starting_trait.name: Forgetful
starting_trait.description: You have a hard time remembering things.  Your skills will erode slightly faster than usual.

starting_trait.name: Lightweight
starting_trait.description: Alcohol and drugs go straight to your head.  You suffer the negative effects of these for longer.

starting_trait.name: Addictive Personality
starting_trait.description: It's easier for you to become addicted to substances, and harder to rid yourself of these addictions.

starting_trait.name: Trigger Happy
starting_trait.description: On rare occasion, you will go full-auto when you intended to fire a single shot.  This has no effect when firing handguns or other semi-automatic firearms.

starting_trait.name: Smelly
starting_trait.description: Your scent is particularly strong.  It's not offensive to humans, but animals that track your scent will do so more easily.

starting_trait.name: Chemical Imbalance
starting_trait.description: You suffer from a minor chemical imbalance, whether mental or physical.  Minor changes to your internal chemistry will manifest themselves on occasion, such as hunger, sleepiness, narcotic effects, etc.

starting_trait.name: Schizophrenic
starting_trait.description: You will periodically suffer from delusions, ranging from minor effects to full visual hallucinations.  Some of these effects may be controlled through the use of Thorazine.

starting_trait.name: Jittery
starting_trait.description: During moments of great stress or under the effects of stimulants, you may find your hands shaking uncontrollably, severely reducing your dexterity.

starting_trait.name: Hoarder
starting_trait.description: You don't feel right unless you're carrying as much as you can.  You suffer morale penalties for carrying less than maximum volume (weight is ignored).  Xanax can help control this anxiety.

starting_trait.name: Savant
starting_trait.description: You tend to specialize in one skill and be poor at all others.  You advance at half speed in all skills except your best one.  Note that combining this with Fast Learner will come out to a slower rate of learning for all skills.

starting_trait.name: Mood Swings
starting_trait.description: Your morale will shift up and down at random, often dramatically.

starting_trait.name: Weak Stomach
starting_trait.description: You are more likely to throw up from food poisoning, alcohol, etc.

starting_trait.name: Wool Allergy
starting_trait.description: You are badly allergic to wool, and can not wear any clothing made of the substance.

starting_trait.name: Truth Teller
starting_trait.description: When you try to tell a lie, you blush, stammer, and get all shifty-eyed.  Telling lies and otherwise bluffing will be much more difficult for you.

starting_trait.name: Ugly
starting_trait.description: You're not much to look at.  NPCs who care about such things will react poorly to you.

starting_trait.name: Hardcore
starting_trait.description: Your whole body can't take much abuse.  Its maximum HP is 75%% points lower than usual.  Stacks with Glass Jaw.  Not for casuals.

starting_trait.name: Bug - PF_MAX
starting_trait.description: This shouldn't be here!  You have the trait PF_MAX toggled.  Weird.

starting_trait.name: Rough Skin
starting_trait.description: Your skin is slightly rough.  This has no gameplay effect.

starting_trait.name: High Night Vision
starting_trait.description: You can see incredibly well in the dark!

starting_trait.name: Full Night Vision
starting_trait.description: You can see in pitch blackness as if you were wearing night-vision goggles.

starting_trait.name: Infrared Vision
starting_trait.description: Your eyes have mutated to pick up radiation in the infrared spectrum.

starting_trait.name: Very Fast Healer
starting_trait.description: Your flesh regenerates slowly, and you will regain HP even when not sleeping.

starting_trait.name: Regeneration
starting_trait.description: Your flesh regenerates from wounds incredibly quickly.

starting_trait.name: Fangs
starting_trait.description: Your teeth have grown into two-inch-long fangs, allowing you to make an extra attack when conditions favor it.

starting_trait.name: Nictitating Membrane
starting_trait.description: You have a second set of clear eyelids which lower while underwater, allowing you to see as though you were wearing goggles.

starting_trait.name: Gills
starting_trait.description: You've grown a set of gills in your neck, allowing you to breathe underwater.

starting_trait.name: Scales
starting_trait.description: A set of flexible green scales have grown to cover your body, acting as a natural armor.

starting_trait.name: Thick Scales
starting_trait.description: A set of heavy green scales have grown to cover your body, acting as a natural armor.  It is very difficult to penetrate, but also limits your flexibility, resulting in a -2 penalty to Dexterity.

starting_trait.name: Sleek Scales
starting_trait.description: A set of very flexible and slick scales have grown to cover your body.  These act as a weak set of armor, improve your ability to swim, and make you difficult to grab.

starting_trait.name: Light Bones
starting_trait.description: Your bones are very light.  This enables you to run and attack 10%% faster, but also reduces your carrying weight by 20%% and makes bashing attacks hurt a little more.

starting_trait.name: Feathers
starting_trait.description: Iridescent feathers have grown to cover your entire body, providing a marginal protection against attacks and minor protection from cold. They also provide a natural waterproofing.

starting_trait.name: Lightly Furred
starting_trait.description: Light fur has grown to coveryour entire body, providing slight protection from cold.

starting_trait.name: Furry
starting_trait.description: Thick black fur has grown to cover your entire body, providing a marginal protection against attacks, and considerable protection from cold.

starting_trait.name: Chitinous Skin
starting_trait.description: Your epidermis has turned into a thin, flexible layer of chitin.  It provides minor protection from cutting wounds.

starting_trait.name: Chitinous Armor
starting_trait.description: You've grown a chitin exoskeleton, much like that of an insect.  It provides considerable physical protection, but reduces your dexterity by 1.

starting_trait.name: Chitinous Plate
starting_trait.description: You've grown a chitin exoskeleton made of thick, stiff plates, like that of a beetle.  It provides excellent physical protection, but reduces your dexterity by 1 and encumbers all body parts but your eyes and mouth.

starting_trait.name: Spines
starting_trait.description: Your skin is covered with fine spines.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive moderate damage.

starting_trait.name: Quills
starting_trait.description: Your body is covered with large quills.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive significant damage.

starting_trait.name: Phelloderm
starting_trait.description: Your skin is light green and has a slightly woody quality to it.  This provides a weak armor, and helps you retain moisture, resulting in less thirst.

starting_trait.name: Bark
starting_trait.description: Your skin is coated in a light bark, like that of a tree.  This provides resistance to bashing and cutting damage and minor protection from fire.

starting_trait.name: Thorns
starting_trait.description: Your skin is covered in small, woody thorns.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive minor damage.  Your punches may also deal extra damage.

starting_trait.name: Leaves
starting_trait.description: All the hair on your body has turned to long, grass-like leaves.  Apart from being physically striking, these provide you with a minor amount of nutrition while in sunlight.

starting_trait.name: Long Fingernails
starting_trait.description: Your fingernails are long and sharp.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.

starting_trait.name: Claws
starting_trait.description: You have claws on the ends of your fingers.  If you aren't wearing gloves, your unarmed attacks deal a minor amount of cutting damage.

starting_trait.name: Large Talons
starting_trait.description: Your index fingers have grown into huge talons.  After a bit of practice, you find that this does not affect your dexterity, but allows for a deadly unarmed attack.  They also prevent you from wearing gloves.

starting_trait.name: Radiogenic
starting_trait.description: Your system has adapted to radiation.  While irradiated, you will actually heal slowly, converting the radiation into hit points.

starting_trait.name: Marloss Carrier
starting_trait.description: Ever since you ate that Marloss berry, you can't get its scent out of your nose, and you have a strong desire to eat more.

starting_trait.name: Insect Pheromones
starting_trait.description: Your body produces low-level pheromones, identifying you as a friend to many species of insects.  Insects will attack you much less.

starting_trait.name: Mammal Pheromones
starting_trait.description: Your body produces low-level pheromones which puts mammals at ease.  They will be less likely to attack or flee from you.

starting_trait.name: Disease Immune
starting_trait.description: Your body is simply immune to diseases.  You will never catch an ambient disease.

starting_trait.name: Poisonous
starting_trait.description: Your body produces a potent venom.  Any special attacks from mutatations have a chance to poison your target.

starting_trait.name: Slime Hands
starting_trait.description: The skin on your hands is a mucous membrane and produces a thick, acrid slime.  Attacks using your hand will cause minor acid damage.

starting_trait.name: Compound Eyes
starting_trait.description: Your eyes are compound, like those of an insect.  This increases your perception by 2 so long as you aren't wearing eyewear.

starting_trait.name: Padded Feet
starting_trait.description: The bottoms of your feet are strongly padded.  You receive no movement penalty for not wearing shoes, and even receive a 10%% bonus when running barefoot.

starting_trait.name: Hooves
starting_trait.description: Your feet have fused into hooves.  This allows kicking attacks to do much more damage, provides natural armor, and removes the need to wear shoes; however, you can not wear shoes of any kind.

starting_trait.name: Saprovore
starting_trait.description: Your digestive system is specialized to allow you to consume decaying material.  You can eat rotten food, albeit for less nutrition than usual.

starting_trait.name: Ruminant
starting_trait.description: Your digestive system is capable of digesting cellulose and other rough plant material.  You can eat underbrush by standing over it and pressing E.

starting_trait.name: Horns
starting_trait.description: You have a pair of small horns on your head.  They allow you to make a weak piercing headbutt attack.

starting_trait.name: Curled Horns
starting_trait.description: You have a pair of large curled horns, like those of a ram.  They allow you to make a strong bashing headbutt attack, but prevent you from wearing any headwear.

starting_trait.name: Pointed Horns
starting_trait.description: You have a pair of long, pointed horns, like those of an antelope.  They allow you to make a strong piercing headbutt attack, but prevent you from wearing any headwear the is not made of fabric.

starting_trait.name: Antennae
starting_trait.description: You have a pair of antennae.  They allow you to detect the presence of monsters up to a few tiles away, even if you can't see or hear them, but prevent you from wearing headwear that is not made of fabric.

starting_trait.name: Road-Runner
starting_trait.description: Your legs are extremely limber and fast-moving.  You run 30%% faster on flat surfaces.

starting_trait.name: Stubby Tail
starting_trait.description: You have a short, stubby tail, like a rabbit's.  It serves no purpose.

starting_trait.name: Tail Fin
starting_trait.description: You have a fin-like tail.  It allows you to swim more quickly.

starting_trait.name: Long Tail
starting_trait.description: You have a long, graceful tail, like that of a big cat.  It improves your balance, making your ability to dodge higher.

starting_trait.name: Fluffy Tail
starting_trait.description: You have a long, fluffy-furred tail.  It greatly improves your balance, making your ability to dodge much higher.

starting_trait.name: Spiked Tail
starting_trait.description: You have a long tail that ends in a vicious stinger, like that of a scorpion.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful piercing attack.

starting_trait.name: Club Tail
starting_trait.description: You have a long tail that ends in a heavy, bony club.  It does not improve your balance at all, but alows for a powerful bashing attack.

starting_trait.name: Pain Recovery
starting_trait.description: You recover from pain slightly faster than normal.

starting_trait.name: Quick Pain Recovery
starting_trait.description: You recover from pain faster than normal.

starting_trait.name: Very Quick Pain Reovery
starting_trait.description: You recover from pain much faster than normal.

starting_trait.name: Bird Wings
starting_trait.description: You have a pair of large, feathered wings.  Your body is too heavy to be able to fly, but you can use them to slow your descent during a fall, and will not take falling damage under any circumstances.

starting_trait.name: Insect Wings
starting_trait.description: You have a pair of large, translucent wings.  You buzz them as you run, enabling you to run faster.

starting_trait.name: Mouth Tentacles
starting_trait.description: A set of tentacles surrounds your mouth.  They allow you to eat twice as fast.

starting_trait.name: Mandibles
starting_trait.description: A set of insect-like mandibles have grown around your mouth.  They allow you to eat faster and provide a slicing unarmed attack, but prevent you from wearing mouthwear.

starting_trait.name: Canine Ears
starting_trait.description: Your ears have extended into long, pointed ones, like those of a canine. They enhance your hearing, allowing you to hear at greater distances.

starting_trait.name: Web Walker
starting_trait.description: Your body excretes very fine amounts of a chemical which prevents you from sticking to webs.  Walking through webs does not affect you at all.

starting_trait.name: Web Weaver
starting_trait.description: Your body produces webs.  As you move, there is a chance that you will leave webs in your wake.

starting_trait.name: Whiskers
starting_trait.description: You have a set of prominent rodent-like whiskers around your mouth.  These make you more aware of vibrations in the air, and improve your ability to dodge very slightly.

starting_trait.name: Strong
starting_trait.description: Your muscles are a little stronger.  Strength + 1

starting_trait.name: Very Strong
starting_trait.description: Your muscles are stronger.  Strength + 2

starting_trait.name: Extremely Strong
starting_trait.description: Your muscles are much stronger.  Strength + 4

starting_trait.name: Insanely Strong
starting_trait.description: Your muscles are noticably bulging.  Strength + 7

starting_trait.name: Dextrous
starting_trait.description: You are a little nimbler.  Dexterity + 1

starting_trait.name: Very Dextrous
starting_trait.description: You are nimbler.  Dexterity + 2

starting_trait.name: Extremely Dextrous
starting_trait.description: You are nimble and quick.  Dexterity + 4

starting_trait.name: Insanely Dextrous
starting_trait.description: You are much nimbler than before.  Dexterity + 7

starting_trait.name: Smart
starting_trait.description: You are a little smarter.  Intelligence + 1

starting_trait.name: Very Smart
starting_trait.description: You are smarter.  Intelligence + 2

starting_trait.name: Extremely Smart
starting_trait.description: You are much smarter, and your skull bulges slightly.  Intelligence + 4

starting_trait.name: Insanely Smart
starting_trait.description: Your skull bulges noticably with your impressive brain.  Intelligence + 7

starting_trait.name: Perceptive
starting_trait.description: Your senses are a little keener.  Perception + 1

starting_trait.name: Very Perceptive
starting_trait.description: Your senses are keener.  Perception + 2

starting_trait.name: Extremely Perceptive
starting_trait.description: Your senses are much keener.  Perception + 4

starting_trait.name: Insanely Perceptive
starting_trait.description: You can sense things you never imagined.  Perception + 7

starting_trait.name: Head Bumps
starting_trait.description: You have a pair of bumps on your skull.

starting_trait.name: Antlers
starting_trait.description: You have a huge rack of antlers, like those of a moose.  They prevent you from hearing headwear that is not made of fabric, but provide a weak headbutt attack.

starting_trait.name: Slit Nostrils
starting_trait.description: You have a flattened nose and thin slits for nostrils, giving you a lizard-like appearance.  This makes breathing slightly difficult and increases mouth encumbrance by 1.

starting_trait.name: Forked Tongue
starting_trait.description: Your tongue is forked, like that of a reptile.  This has no effect.

starting_trait.name: Bulging Eyes
starting_trait.description: Your eyes bulge out several inches from your skull.  This does not affect your vision in any way.

starting_trait.name: Mouth Flaps
starting_trait.description: Skin tabs and odd flaps of skin surround your mouth.  They don't affect your eating, but are unpleasant to look at.

starting_trait.name: Wing Stubs
starting_trait.description: You have a pair of stubby little wings projecting from your shoulderblades. They can be wiggled at will, but are useless.

starting_trait.name: Bat Wings
starting_trait.description: You have a pair of large, leathery wings.  You can move them a little, but they are useless, and in fact put you off balance, reducing your ability to dodge slightly.

starting_trait.name: Pale Skin
starting_trait.description: Your skin is rather pale.

starting_trait.name: Spots
starting_trait.description: Your skin is covered in a pattern of red spots.

starting_trait.name: Very Smelly
starting_trait.description: You smell awful.  Monsters that track scent will find you very easily, and humans will react poorly.

starting_trait.name: Deformed
starting_trait.description: You're minorly deformed.  Some people will react badly to your appearance.

starting_trait.name: Badly Deformed
starting_trait.description: You're hideously deformed.  Some people will have a strong negative reaction to your appearance.

starting_trait.name: Grotesque
starting_trait.description: Your visage is disgusting and liable to induce vomiting.  People will not want to interact with you unless they have a very good reason to.

starting_trait.name: Beautiful
starting_trait.description: You're a real head-turner. Some people will react well to your appearance, and most people have an easier time trusting you.

starting_trait.name: Very Beautiful
starting_trait.description: You are a vision of beauty. Some people will react very well to your looks, and most people will trust you immediately.

starting_trait.name: Glorious
starting_trait.description: You are inredibly beautiful. People cannot help themselves for your charms, and will do whatever they can to please you.

starting_trait.name: Hollow Bones
starting_trait.description: You have Avian Bone Syndrome--your bones are nearly hollow.  Your body is very light as a result, enabling you to run and attack 20%% faster, but also frail; you can carry 40%% less, and bashing attacks injure you more.

starting_trait.name: Nausea
starting_trait.description: You feel nauseous almost constantly, and are more liable to throw up from food poisoning, alcohol, etc.

starting_trait.name: Vomitous
starting_trait.description: You have a major digestive disorder, which causes you to vomit frequently.

starting_trait.name: Fast Metabolism
starting_trait.description: You require more food than most people.

starting_trait.name: High Thirst
starting_trait.description: Your body dries out easily; you need to drink a lot more water.

starting_trait.name: Weakening
starting_trait.description: You feel as though you are slowly weakening, but it's so slight a feeling that it does not affect you at all.

starting_trait.name: Deterioration
starting_trait.description: Your body is very slowly wasting away.

starting_trait.name: Disintegration
starting_trait.description: Your body is slowly wasting away!

starting_trait.name: Albino
starting_trait.description: Your skin lacks pigment, and is nearly transparent.  You suffer serious burns in direct sunlight.

starting_trait.name: Sores
starting_trait.description: Your body is covered in painful sores.  The pain is worse when they are covered in clothing.

starting_trait.name: Light Sensitive
starting_trait.description: Sunlight makes you uncomfortable.  If you are outdoors and the weather is Sunny, you suffer -1 to all stats.

starting_trait.name: Very Light Sensitive
starting_trait.description: Sunlight makes you very uncomfortable.  If you are outdoors during the day, you suffer -1 to all stats; -2 if the weather is Sunny.

starting_trait.name: Troglobite
starting_trait.description: Sunlight makes you extremely uncomfortable, resulting in large penalties to all stats.

starting_trait.name: Webbed Hands
starting_trait.description: Your hands and feet are heavily webbed, reducing your dexterity by 1 and preventing you from wearing gloves.  However, you can swim much faster.

starting_trait.name: Beak
starting_trait.description: You have a beak for a mouth.  You can occasionally use it to peck at your enemies, but it is impossible for you to wear mouthgear.

starting_trait.name: Genetically Unstable
starting_trait.description: Your DNA has been damaged in a way that causes you to continually develop more mutations.

starting_trait.name: Minor Radioactivity
starting_trait.description: Your body has become radioactive!  You continuously emit low levels of radiation, some of which will be absorbed by you, and some of which will contaminate the world around you.

starting_trait.name: Radioactivity
starting_trait.description: Your body has become radioactive!  You continuously emit moderate levels of radiation, some of which will be absorbed by you, and some of which will contaminate the world around you.

starting_trait.name: Severe Radioactivity
starting_trait.description: Your body has become radioactive!  You continuously emit heavy levels of radiation, some of which will be absorbed by you, and some of which will contaminate the world around you.

starting_trait.name: Slimy
starting_trait.description: Your body is coated with a fine slime, which oozes off of you, leaving a trail.

starting_trait.name: Herbivore
starting_trait.description: Your body's ability to digest meat is severely hampered.  Eating meat has a good chance of making you vomit it back up; even if you manage to keep it down, its nutritional value is greatly reduced.

starting_trait.name: Carnivore
starting_trait.description: Your body's ability to digest fruits, vegetables and grains is severely hampered.  You cannot eat anything besides meat.

starting_trait.name: Ponderous
starting_trait.description: Your muscles are generally slow to move.  You run 10%% slower.

starting_trait.name: Very Ponderous
starting_trait.description: Your muscles are quite slow to move.  You run 20%% slower.

starting_trait.name: Extremely Ponderous
starting_trait.description: Your muscles are very slow to move.  You run 30%% slower.

starting_trait.name: Sunlight dependent
starting_trait.description: You feel very sluggish when not in direct sunlight.  You suffer a 5%% drop in speed when in shade, and a 10%% drop in speed when in the dark.

starting_trait.name: Heat dependent
starting_trait.description: Your muscle response is dependent on ambient temperatures.  You lose 1%% of your speed for every 5 degrees below 65 F.

starting_trait.name: Very Heat dependent
starting_trait.description: Your muscle response is highly dependent on ambient temperatures.  You lose 1%% of your speed for every 3 degrees below 65 F.

starting_trait.name: Cold Blooded
starting_trait.description: You are cold-blooded and rely on heat to keep moving.  Your lose 1%% of your speed for every 2 degrees below 65 F.

starting_trait.name: Growling Voice
starting_trait.description: You have a growling, rough voice.  Persuading NPCs will be more difficult, but threatening them will be easier.

starting_trait.name: Snarling Voice
starting_trait.description: You have a threatening snarl in your voice.  Persuading NPCs will be near impossible, but threatening them will be much easier.

starting_trait.name: Shouter
starting_trait.description: You occasionally shout uncontrollably.

starting_trait.name: Screamer
starting_trait.description: You sometimes scream uncontrollably.

starting_trait.name: Howler
starting_trait.description: You frequently let out a piercing howl.

starting_trait.name: Tentacle Arms
starting_trait.description: Your arms have transformed into tentacles.  Though they are flexible and increase your dexterity by 1, the lack of fingers results in a permanent hand encumbrance of 3, and prevents the wearing of gloves.

starting_trait.name: 4 Tentacles
starting_trait.description: Your arms have transformed into four tentacles, resulting in a bonus of 1 to dexterity, permanent hand encumbrance of 3, and preventing you from wearing gloves.  You can make up to 3 extra attacks with them.

starting_trait.name: 8 Tentacles
starting_trait.description: Your arms have transformed into eight tentacles, resulting in a bonus of 1 to dexterity, permanent hand encumbrance of 3, and preventing you from wearing gloves.  You can make up to 7 extra attacks with them.

starting_trait.name: Shell
starting_trait.description: You have grown a thick shell over your torso, providing excellent armor.  You find you can use the empty space as 16 storage space, but cannot wear anything on your torso.

starting_trait.name: Leg Tentacles
starting_trait.description: Your legs have transformed into six tentacles.  This decreases your speed on land by 20%%, but makes your movement silent.  However, they also increase your swimming speed.
